title: Problem with client
body: Just now I was in game laying as sona and all of sudden i got attempt to reconnect for bout a min long. then I quit the game and I can't reconnect. The client wont show that I was in a game, but 3rd party sites say I am.

replies.body: because the game client is letting me, I went into the practice tool and I can load that, but idk how I load into the other game

If it isn't giving you the option to reconnect to that match, it might mean that specific game crashed for some unexpected reason. It happens pretty rarely, but typically those 'ghost' games will not have an effect on your record, since our records can't seem to find the match anymore.

Just in case though, let's make sure to do a little troubleshooting with your network to make sure you're able to stay in those matches from now on. Check out our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and make sure to go through each step, as they effect different things. Hit me back up if you aren't seeing any improvement though!
